title: Hitting the Books: Raytheon, Yahoo Finance and the rise of the 'cybersmear' lawsuit - Yahoo Finance
content: Hitting the Books: Raytheon, Yahoo Finance and the rise of the 'cybersmear' lawsuit  Yahoo Finance
description: That time Raytheon subpoenaed Yahoo! to get it to give up the names of three anonymous Y! Finance message board users so it could sue them too.
